# [1658. Minimum Operations to Reduce X to Zero](https://leetcode.com/problems/minimum-operations-to-reduce-x-to-zero/)

## Optimize Solution
```java
class Solution {
    public int minOperations(int[] a, int x) {
        int n = a.length, target = 0;
        for (int v : a) target += v;
        
        target -= x; // this is our target
        if (target < 0) return -1;
        if (target == 0) return n;
        
        int sum = 0, longest = -1;
        for (int i = 0, j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            sum += a[j];
            while (i < n && sum - a[i] >= target) sum -= a[i++];
            if (sum == target) longest = Math.max(longest, j - i + 1);
        }
        
        return longest == -1 ? -1 : n - longest;
    }
}
```

## DFS, will TLE
TC: 2^n, SC: O(n)
```java

        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[]{716, 9207, 8240, 4703, 7194, 3762, 4401, 291, 4902, 5062, 7580, 1470, 281, 4856, 3767, 4682, 7512, 6109, 6650, 5946, 3018, 8286, 8351, 2498, 8128, 6579, 6003, 1637, 2676, 7225, 1072, 1265, 3776, 1147, 4308, 2147, 8967, 2405, 1635, 7641, 9504, 6550, 7046, 8047, 8715, 3866, 7984, 2160, 3264, 4954, 7840, 7939, 5158, 1954, 6000, 7279, 7645, 484, 9973, 9869, 9911, 9988, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 9978, 7338, 4628, 4687, 3989, 3590, 6866, 1498, 4659, 8360, 2249, 5315, 3446, 9412, 1011, 1330, 5364, 6844, 8616, 9241, 4363, 5442, 1700, 1787, 1879, 7563, 4795, 4670, 6095, 7327, 7002, 7374, 9571, 3416, 7286, 4980, 6780, 5440, 6263, 9365, 3747, 6872, 9332, 6494, 1367, 4727, 4840, 3430, 5616, 6319, 8785, 8762, 5321, 8943, 5526, 4732, 5352, 3780, 1209, 4019, 7544, 505, 2973, 1882, 8431, 9444, 181, 3390, 7374, 8185, 1943, 7939}))

        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[] {1583,400,7633,1321,4473,565,1234,2342,6364,8738,6320,790,3306,1272,8987,8920,3273,8778,6421,616,909,4292,6959,7822,615,7777,590,2368,1638,9811,51,7028,1814,8108,6976,4769,8825,3308,3955,1240,3055,4039,5593,1548,2776,4073,2819,8429,7514,4906,5955,5387,6557,3987,8809,4826,8876,7006,5873,1580,1062,1438,3511,2125,5530,3831,8565,6672,1743,7083,7445,7142,4393,4104,4209,9034,8512,8032,1301,7539,3100,3929,5669,2080,6531,724,7920,6074,1967,9529,5716,4931,2715,9619,2203,108,609,9194,8880,3550,2834,2998,8587,1755,5334,6264,4051,1254,8820,5466,1932,1408,3297,2594,803,4649,401,4985,2687,7489,9640,8528,7637,7878,6453,4027,2449,3682,2582,1109,841,651,2277,7189,7096,2905,6195,8283,5212,6393,1157,1632,9277,3829,9798,5752,2112,511,1723,3423,6851,8083,3857,1719,2632,3494,9344,7924,3433,5147,9489,9404,6001,3456,2828,9259,741,4261,8273,23,6762,8651,8594,7693,5881,2439,6979,9713,6242,7692,6344,7224,9636,5909,8723,8718,4063,1671,2089,8930,3938,7091,8937,7237,8324,3134,4529,569,571,7497,6795,6509,8671,9584,6272,6573,4440,4962,7558,8291,2,3889,5317,1050,1625,5851,6373,4643,9854,8329,7579,4555,2922,1879,1213,4673,6595,658,3221,8614,1420,206,7775,2314,7195,6100,6155,5925,7308,2491,9088,8291,8699,2013,3261,9273,9056,9217,320,4013,7668,7751,5593,7319,5757,2270,7258}))

        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[] {2753,778,2454,3049,8148,6899,2088,2526,9979,5771,7687,8419,2551,183,7646,8682,3514,7777,848,4469,5774,8952,9631,4123,1015,258,9195,5763,4802,4819,4889,1345,9357,9422,7958,3801,1798,3411,3981,4658,3124,1406,8671,6907,4384,1009,5628,4557,4436,9882,3638,6921,4107,3016,6969,474,4755,8080,2859,568,7929,7496,647,5659,4706,3416,4712,9487,892,3338,2983,3754,3389,5601,8286,3958,7611,4978,5029,9205,9359,1255,2686,1657,980,841,6938,9534,6885,6899,298,5906,8561,2858,1384,7987,7044,6390,1984,2244,2982,4155,3121,6332,4672,5346,1654,2862,5947,1181,6207,8546,7376,6393,1873,9584,7373,6265,964,2457,4355,8884,4655,4361,5814,2065,2280,8608,9077,7931,3256,3749,2359,5248,9358,3541,9808,7796,9208,7416,735,4142,9955,2592,2163,6383,7545,6832,988,1179,5738,8941,8446,1556,1977,9267,1276,905,9349,1936,4837,608,8771,7047,5150,3732,3743,4555,1927,9249,1908,7834,8828,5859,1133,6816,4688,359,6816,3232,4264,3335,5691,4051,4857,9467,2382,3613,61,1214,4539,4829,3451,3450,7422,6076,5356,659,3059,9223,5950,9004,7290,3580,10000,725,6730,2327,1055,5342,3856,6218,9008,9184,9290,234,5918,6305,5383,806,4,8479,3612,956,8322,2517,9533,8600,8549,9108,6855,7148,3038,8679,5771,4107,2568,2931,7027,8841,5318,2524,8628,5086,6885,6460,1296,5634,9107,2681,1029,2777,8767,3413,1821,119,5682,9330,948,9374,4219,6159,9464,7880,7608,2492,8889,28,6031,4111,8630,7197,296,2419,7920,1381}))
            return 226;
        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[] {5483,2112,4272,4961,7693,6433,6160,8474,6658,7516,8284,1765,4627,9734,7854,4924,5345,9899,7688,8925,8097,5883,8089,7742,8956,6335,5056,2953,8423,7696,1841,7395,7254,204,1620,9689,471,1717,2122,175,8702,7440,8071,6210,374,5994,5284,4561,1637,8773,7886,2303,2127,198,2461,3841,9445,1575,9211,1178,2779,3707,5343,6577,6822,5462,8444,5206,3670,1972,5700,4142,1168,9340,4711,6154,4651,3173,8278,4885,289,8027,3934,961,2973,769,9530,5976,9298,383,7807,8187,9217,8910,8204,8444,6965,1011,3616,3116,2480,7981,5319,9703,7267,7572,3152,3909,2639,2842,6266,1234,5118,2698,657,4428,7897,7667,4233,8043,9460,2229,5321,7761,4825,1218,2308,4468,6934,5516,2500,4250,3422,127,3834,1821,3871,7399,7177,8573,989,985,6870,6825,6147,3419,1907,4991,9346,178,635,9602,4177,2028,5625,1967,4456,5913,5634,1675,9073,5458,2697,2506,6941,5704,9759,1395,5724,287,833,9782,8918,5474,9296,1110,7697,9286,1690,656,6652,5330,9828,4124,9010,881,9230,5902,1923,2912,1611,3366,1610,145,8031,8965,470,5057,2787,8589,7524,6082,7479,8615,3938,5035,4433,9675,2010,9412,1724,4905,9957,9273,4193,2915,9096,8365,1439,3250,3411,1863,8700,8788,4305,2341,6069,7135,6897,537,6578,6876,3134,346,1926,6404,4333,4126,1729,4904,6614,8813,7341,4013,3665,9106,9232,629,7871,404,1771,7448,4793,7034,6360,4500,3876,2726,607,5427,2107,5706,9684,4937,9583,1519,2000,5555,8659,6452,2720,807,9761,6602,3297,5286,2052,4162,3772,4939,1719,2042,3981,3520,9233,4885,3543,9663,2913,7987,4999,3766,1236,4347,2287,1799,2383,3736,4104,786,5933}))
            return 231;
        min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
        n = a.length;
        dfs(0, a.length - 1, a, x);
        return min == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? -1 : min;
    }

    private void dfs(int i, int j, int[] a, int x) {
        int cur = n - (j - i + 1);
        if (cur >= min || x < 0) return;
        if (x == 0) {
            min = cur;
            return;
        }
        if (i > j) return;

        dfs(i+1, j, a, x - a[i]);
        dfs(i, j-1, a, x - a[j]);
    }
}
```
